businessModel: Decentralized lending platform allowing instant crypto-backed loans.
tokenomics: Interest fees on loans, staking rewards for liquidity providers.
competitiveAdvantage: First platform with automated collateral liquidation and cross-chain support.
shortTermRoadmap: Launch MVP, onboard initial liquidity providers, start marketing campaign.
longTermVision: Become the leading DeFi lending protocol across multiple blockchains in 3 years.
scalabilityPlan: Integrate with Layer 2 solutions and partner with other DeFi protocols.

businessModel: Marketplace for artists to tokenize and sell their music rights as NFTs.
tokenomics: Transaction fees, royalties automatically distributed on-chain.
competitiveAdvantage: Direct royalty payments, blockchain-verified ownership, NFT collectibles for fans.
shortTermRoadmap: Launch beta marketplace, onboard 50 artists, integrate Ethereum and Solana networks.
longTermVision: Global music NFT marketplace with artist DAO governance.
scalabilityPlan: Expand to multiple blockchains, enable cross-platform royalty tracking.

businessModel: Blockchain platform for carbon credit trading and tracking.
tokenomics: Transaction fees on carbon credit trading, staking rewards for validators.
competitiveAdvantage: Transparent, traceable, and verifiable carbon credits on-chain.
shortTermRoadmap: Partner with environmental NGOs, pilot program with 5 companies.
longTermVision: Global adoption for carbon credit trading, integrate IoT tracking.
scalabilityPlan: Add additional ecosystems, partner with governments and corporations.

businessModel: Metaverse game where players earn tokens via gameplay and trading.
tokenomics: In-game token rewards, NFT marketplace for virtual assets.
competitiveAdvantage: Early mover advantage in gamified blockchain metaverse with tokenized assets.
shortTermRoadmap: Beta launch, recruit initial players, NFT marketplace setup.
longTermVision: Global metaverse gaming economy with decentralized governance.
scalabilityPlan: Integrate AR/VR experiences, multi-chain NFT interoperability.
